title: NO MISSION HELP!!! NEW UPDATE
body: I need help guys.. i got the new update but i have no mission and when I look at my friends account he has mission and I don't can you guys explain to me? Thks

replies.body: I have the exact same problem...
lol me too... just confused if you can help me
Hey there, which mission are you looking for specifically?

yea i 10k blue essence mission
 but i also want general mission
